snippet: A woman who pleaded guilty to killing six of her newborns and hiding their bodies in her garage has been sentenced to up to life in prison.
abstract: Megan Huntsman of Utah is sentenced to life in prison for killing her six of her newborn children and hiding their bodies in her garage for more than a decade.
lead_paragraph: A woman who pleaded guilty to killing six of her newborns and hiding their bodies in her garage has been sentenced to up to life in prison.

headline.main: Utah: Mother Sentenced in 6 Babies’ Deaths
headline.print_headline: Utah: Mother Sentenced in 6 Babies’ Deaths
